description: Ready made bases leave more time to create a tasty meaty topping for pizza night.
name: Spicy Beef & Capsicum Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the mince mixture between the two bases and spread out with a spoon. Sprinkle over grated mozzarella and bake for 10 minutes or until golden and bubbling.
